name: THERAPY
description:
THERAPY is a tiny little game about a therapist(?).

WHAT'S INSIDE?

  • Interactive Fiction! + Bullet Hell! (very undertale inspired)
  • 3 endings!
  • 2 tiny secret bonus levels.
  • A single SONG. that I made in beepbox literally 10 minutes before the submission deadline and shoved into Unity god help me.
  • A sad bean's will to live. 
  • typos

JAM THEME

  •  It's about losing your "soul". The "soul" is shattered (or made lesser) when hit by obstacles. The tradeoff having more lives is less morality (would you trust a shady therapist for more lives,) and also a bit less speed/responsiveness.
  • So yeah... stuff like that.

HOW DO I PLAY

  • the MOUSE!

OPTIONAL TIPS

  • Mr Therapist will restore your lives if you chose to TRUST him when he asks.
  • If you refuse to trust him your remaining lives will carry over. (You could be stuck with one life for a while so chose wisely!)
  • After the game ends it loops back to the beginning, in case you're not sure where it ends

CREDITS

  • Me! I did everything in 3 days
